title: Trump admin tells states to undo efforts to issue full SNAP benefits
shortDescription: The U.S. Department of Agriculture directed states to roll back any steps taken to issue full food aid benefits to low-income Americans.

title: Did the Democrats get their mojo back? Rural Virginia sounds off
shortDescription: USA TODAY spoke to more than a dozen people in the two small towns of Kilmarnock and Irvington in Virginia to get their take on the Democratic brand.

title: Virginia voters want change in Democratic focus
shortDescription: USA TODAY’s Swapna Venugopal Ramaswamy hears Virginia voters urge Democrats to refocus on affordability and youth leadership.

title: Biden touts Dems election wins, pans Trump policies
shortDescription: Former President Biden, speaking in Omaha, Nebraska, took the Trump administration to task for its policies on SNAP, health care and cancer research.

title: Biden slams Trump for 'immoral' SNAP cuts
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden slammed President Trump for the government shutdown and his refusal to pay SNAP benefits for vulnerable Americans.

title: Trump threatens to punish NYC for Mamdani. Will he arrest new mayor?
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani, the 34-year-old democratic socialist, hasn't taken office yet. But he's already looking to "Trump-proof" New York City.

title: Meet the young Black MAGA fans trying to grow Trump's movement
shortDescription: Gone are the days of Colin Powell and Condoleezza Rice. The next generation of Black conservatives are more brash. Can going viral lead to victory?

title: Judge sides with Oregon, says Trump cannot deploy troops to Portland
shortDescription: U.S. District Court Judge Karin Immergut concluded the Trump administration had violated the 10th Amendment and that the deployments "exceeded the President’s authority."

title: DOJ readying subpoenas for top Obama officials from Trump-Russia probe
shortDescription: The grand jury probe marks a significant escalation of Trump's retaliation against Obama aides who led a probe of his 2016 campaign's ties to Russia.

title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to block SNAP funding order
shortDescription: The Trump administration filed a last-minute appeal with the Supreme Court to not have to pay full SNAP food aid benefits to millions of Americans.

title: President Trump says US will boycott G20 summit in South Africa
shortDescription: President Trump said no US officials will attend the upcoming G20 summit in South Africa, citing the treatment of white South African farmers.

title: 'They're jealous': Trump hosts MAGA hero Viktor Orban
shortDescription: Orban, who has clamped down on the Hungarian press and the liberal opposition, is a hero to many in the MAGA movement.

title: Trump pardons MLB star Darryl Strawberry for tax evasion conviction
shortDescription: President Trump has pardoned retired baseball star Darryl Strawberry for a tax evasion conviction three decades ago.

title: Watch Trump's reaction to Zohran Mamdani's NYC mayoral election win.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reacted to the 2025 election by piling on the communist accusations about Zohran Mamdani. See what they had to say.
